feels.name: Annoyance
feels.quote: Oh, mother, what rubbish you talk! Of course I’m not tired of Windy Corner.

feels.name: Disappointment
feels.quote: Waste! That word seemed to sum up the whole of life. Wasted plans, wasted money, wasted love, and she had wounded her mother.

feels.name: Confusion
feels.quote: Not a word would come to her lips. Lucy selected a book—a volume of Old Testament commentaries. Holding it up to her eyes, she said: “I have no wish to discuss Italy or any subject connected with your son.”

feels.name: Disgust
feels.quote: Feeling a little steadier, she put the book back and turned round to him. His face was drooping and swollen, but his eyes, though they were sunken deep, gleamed with a child’s courage.
